document.full_text: after a brief respite of cooler, calmer weather, the wildfires that have ravaged texas kicked up again on friday with flames shooting up to 30 feet in the air, officials said.
document.title: after brief respite, texas wildfires kick up again
lines_and_colors: after a brief respite of cooler, calmer weather, the wildfires that have ravaged texas kicked up again on friday with flames shooting up to 30 feet in the air, officials said.
